ygData.subject: Re: hey...
ygData.msgSnippet: I play because I enjoy reading Fantasy genre books. Magic, lore, dragons, etc have always interested me. Playing EverQuest allows me to interact in a game with
ygData.messageBody:
I play because I enjoy reading Fantasy genre
books. Magic, lore, dragons, etc have always interested
me. Playing EverQuest allows me to interact in a game
with thousands of other people who share at least one
common interest.<br><br>I've made many friends ingame
and regardless of distance and limited interaction
with them in a game environment, I have become close
with some of them. I suppose it could be seen as a
step up from the Pen Pal relationships of older
days.<br><br>I know couples who play, and use the game as a
place to escape together in something they both
enjoy.<br><br>People all over the world play this game and almost
never worry about race, religion, disabilities,
illnesses, sexual preference, etc. If you like games and
enjoy the Sci-Fi or Fantasy realms, you may like
EQ.<br><br>And God help you if you do, cause it can be
addicting. :)<br><br>Synthe Hateblade<br>Mythic
Legion<br>Druzzil Ro
